translation: I am the father of this world, the mother, the dispenser of the fruits of actions, and the grandfather; the one thing to be known, the purifier, the sacred monosyllable (Om), and also the Rik, Sama, and Yajur Vedas.
commentary: 9.17 Father father? I'm I? of this of this? The world of the world? Mother mother? Dhata the dispenser of the fruits of actions? Grandfather: grandfather? Vedyam the (one) thing to be known? Pavitram the purifier? Omkara: the Omkara? Rik Rik? Sama Sama? Yaju: Yajus? Eve also? f and.Commentary Dhata Supporter or sustainer by dispenser of the fruits of actions.Isvara or the Saguna Brahman is the father. MulaPrakriti or the primordial
